project-description_metagenome_name: Pacific Equatorial Divergence Province Megatenomic Sample
sample-isolation-and-treatment_sample_is: surface water microbial community samples from the 5 - 0.2 micron size fraction were taken at 7 locations between Fiji and Hawaii on board the Centre for Microbial Oceanography: Research and Eduction - Biological Oceanography of the Upper Ocean: Latitudinal Assessment (CMORE-BULA) cruise. The samples range from the South Pacific Subtropical Gyre, across the region of equatorial upwelling, into the North Pacific subtropical gyre.
